In Their 26th Year Of Glory, FairLight Released #1083

Don't Starve (c) Klei Entertainment

:  Supplied by: FAIRLIGHT            : : Release Date: 24-04-2013
 Cracked by:  FAIRLIGHT              Game Type:    Adventure, Indie
 Packaged by: FAIRLIGHT              Image Format: BIN/CUE
 -----
 DISCS: 1 CD                        Protection: Steam

System Requirements : Hunger

Game information
 =================

Don't Starve is an uncompromising wilderness survival game full of science
 and magic

You play as Wilson, an intrepid Gentleman Scientist who has  been  trapped
 by a demon and transported to a mysterious wilderness world.  Wilson  must
 learn to exploit his environment and its inhabitants if he ever  hopes  to
 escape and find his way back home

Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange  creatures,  dangers,
 and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures  that  match
 your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the  mysteries  of  this
 strange land

Features
 =========
 Uncompromising Survival & World Exploration
 Constant Updates
 Dark and Whimsical Visuals
 Randomly Generated New Worlds

Installation Information
 =========================

Burn or mount
 Install
 Play the game

NOTE: As usual, block the game exe in your firewall

/TEAM FAiRLIGHT

-  QUALITY, TRADITION  AND PRIDE -

Working great. thx.

After so many years ppl don't know how to use .iso its just insulting. 

So after you DL file, open it with WinRAR and unrar it somewhere, after that if you have win 7 download some mount iso software like VirtualCloneDrive or demon tools, win8 has its own mount and just right click on .bin and mount it.

After you mounted and install, just copy/overwrite steam_api.dll from FTL bin folder to install folder and you are good to go.

Downloaded, mounted, and installed. Then I got the steam_api.dll is missing error when I tried to run the program. I tried following Pinanclee's instructions to copy/overwrite the steam_api.dll file in the Fairlight->Bin folder on the mounted disc, but my system wont let me copy/paste that file into the install folder. 

I then tried downloading that dll file on dll-files-download dot com. I got the file and put it in the right place, but then when I open the game, it just takes me to the game page on Steam...where I can purchase the game. I still am unable to play it. 

So is the steam_api.dll file included in the torrent a different version that will allow me to play? If so, how do I copy and paste that to the install folder? Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Yeah, i have the same problem, I tried to copy the steam_api.dll file from the bin folder and my pc won´t let me, any help is well appreciated! Thanks

For those who struggle with getting it installed. Simply right click the 1 file, open with, find your WinRar.exe (probably C:ProgramFiles/WinRar/Winrar.exe) open it with the winrar.exe, extract to wherever u want, than u will find the file u are looking for to mount.
